Docs.summary: Callback interface used to deliver copies of preview frames as they are displayed.

Docs.param: the contents of the preview frame in the format defined by , which can be queried with . If is never called, the default will be the YCbCr_420_SP (NV21) format.
Docs.summary: Called as preview frames are displayed.
